name: My Family Tree Data File
summary: Learn about .FAMILYX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Chronoplex Software introduced the FAMILYX format in 2010 when it released My Family Tree. You can save your information to a FAMILYX file and then share it with other users or store it as a backup.

You can also protect FAMILYX files with a password by selecting File → Protect File. After protecting the file, the app sets it as a read-only version until you enter the correct password. If you want to encrypt the FAMILYX file with authenticated 256-bit AES encryption, select File → Save as and then choose My Family Tree Files (encrypted) from the "Save as" dropdown menu to save it as a .FAMILYXS file.

instructions: You can open FAMILYX files with My Family Tree in Windows. To open a FAMILYX file with the software, select File → Open.
Additionally, if the file is password-protected, you must enter the correct password to open it. If you do not have the correct password you will be unable to open or export it.
My Family Tree can convert FAMILYX files to GEDCOM (.GED) and GEDZip Genealogy Data (.GDZ) files. To do so, select File → Export GEDCOM.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
